Trust us for life

serious medicine
extraordinary care

Caring for the Growing Needs of Our Community.

Supported Living

Live in the Comfort of Home—with a Little Extra Help

For many people with disabilities, staying in a familiar environment makes a huge difference in quality of life. Our Supported Living program is all about providing just enough assistance—whether it’s reminders to take medication, help with light housekeeping, or coaching on daily routines—so clients can maintain independence without sacrificing safety or social connection.

What We Offer

Personalized Daily Schedules

From morning routines to evening check-outs, we create a schedule that balances independence with peace of mind.

Home-Safety Assessments

Before any caregiver steps in, we survey the home and suggest simple modifications: grab bars, non-slip flooring, adaptive kitchen tools, etc.

Skill Coaching

Learn or reinforce everyday tasks—preparing a simple meal, paying a utility bill online, or using public transit—through hands-on guidance.

Health & Wellness Support

Medication reminders, help attending doctor’s appointments, and coordination with healthcare providers if medical needs evolve.

24/7 On-Call Backup

If there’s an unexpected illness, family emergency, or anything outside regular hours, our on-call coordinator steps in to ensure someone is checking on you.

Request a Call Back

Want to Talk One-on-One?

We know that choosing in-home care or day programming is a big decision. Let us answer your questions, walk you through our enrollment steps, and learn more about how we can meet your family’s needs. Fill out the form below, and someone from our intake team will call you within one business day, often within hours.
